name: awesome-app
description: React Native Boilerplate, TypeScript with @react-native-navigation and redux-saga

scripts.android:prod: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf app/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant release
scripts.pre-build:dev:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.pre-build:prod:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.pre-build:dev:ios: rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData  && react-native bundle --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios
scripts.pre-build:prod:ios: rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios
scripts.reset-all: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && yarn install && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache* && rm -rf /tmp/metro-* && watchman watch-del-all && watchman shutdown-server
scripts.reset-all:android: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf android/app/build && yarn install && watchman watch-del-all && cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf app/build && cd ..
scripts.reset-all:ios: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && yarn install && watchman watch-del-all && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && pod install --repo-update && xcodebuild clean && cd ..
scripts.watchman_reset: rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache* && rm -rf /tmp/metro-* && watchman watch-del-all && watchman shutdown-server
